text: Sir John Elliot (6 May 1898 â€“ 18 September 1988) was a British transport and railway manager. Born John Elliot Blumenfeld, he was the son of the Daily Mail news editor R. D. Blumenfeld (who later became managing editor of the Daily Express.) He changed his name to John Elliot in March 1923. ==References== Category:1898 births Category:1988 deaths Category:British Rail Category:Knights Bachelor Category:Transport in London
title: John Elliot (railway manager)
